name: fields interact
description:
By mimicking the feel of real life, you can play as a gang of wrestlers, wrestlers who have to defend Britain's borders. The game, while similar to the upcoming WWE 2K18 video game, expands the genre to include basketball, football and rugby, as well as video games.
Outhouse Media has developed sports games for numerous entertainment platforms including mini-games from EA Sports and NBA 2K, as well as titles from the likes of Max Payne and Halo 5: Guardians. It's expected that the game will be out in the second half of 2016.
